name: How Many Hours
content: Mothers giving birth to a little son
一位母亲生下一个小男孩
Lucky in the rain of falling bombs
他的眼泪像弹雨一样止不住地往外流
Father he is young but old and wise
父亲年轻而又睿智深沉
You see the circle around his eyes
抱着我 遮住我的视线
The evil sides of the world
How many hours and how many days
How many months and how many years
How many centuries and how many times
多少世纪 多少生命
人们像往常一样卖着鲜花
孩子们在嬉闹 像是踩着轮子一般跑来跑去
你看他们飞奔到了空场处
抱着我 遮住我的视线
The evil sides of the world
How many hours and how many days
How many months and how many years
How many centuries and how many times
多少世纪 多少生命
